requireMavenVersion.message: You are running an older version of Maven. JHipster requires at least Maven ${maven.version}

requireJavaVersion.message: You are running an incompatible version of Java. JHipster supports JDK 11 to 18.

configuration.diffExcludeObjects: oauth_access_token, oauth_approvals, oauth_client_details, oauth_client_token, oauth_code, oauth_refresh_token
oauth_access_token, oauth_approvals, oauth_client_details, oauth_client_token, oauth_code, oauth_refresh_token
